item.title: Book Recommendations
item.description: The following books have really helped me in getting better at different competencies and i would highly recommend it to all Tech The Design Of The Unix Operating System - Maurice J Bach Designing Data-Intensive Applications - Martin Kleppmann Introduction to Algorithms - CLRS Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code - Martin Fowler Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software - Erich Gamma Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship - Robert C Martin The Effective Engineer - Edmond Lau Start-ups The hard thing about hard things - Ben Horowitz Zero to One - Peter Thiel Leadership High Output Management - Andrew S Grove Leading - Sir Alex Ferguson

item.title: Building static blog/website using Hugo
item.description: Recently i have set-up this blog using Hugo. I was able to do it over a weekend. It was a fun & rewarding experience. If you are interested in setting up a static blog/website all you have to do is follow these 6 simple steps 1) Select your theme Hugo has a wide variety of themes to select from. Pick your favorite [here] (https://themes.gohugo.io) 2) Setting it up locally
